data.name: awards/tooltip/class
data.value: Click to display the rewards for this vehicle type.

data.name: awards/tooltip/level
data.value: Click to display the rewards for vehicles of this tier.

data.name: awards/tooltip/nation
data.value: Click to display the rewards for this nation.

data.name: button/awards/tooltip
data.value: Click to display the list of all rewards in the competition.

data.name: button/regulations/tooltip
data.value: Click to display the full description of the competition.

data.name: excel/header/reason/battlesLeft
data.value: To get placed in the rating, fight more battles: %(number)s

data.name: excel/noData
data.value: No prize places have been taken yet.

data.name: excel/participate/notParticipated
data.value: You did not get placed in this rating

data.name: maintenance/body
data.value: We are sorry for the temporary inconvenience.

data.name: notification/eventFinished/body
data.value: Competition %(eventName)s has finished. Winners will be established during the next few days, after which they will receive their well-deserved prizes.

data.name: notification/eventJoin/afterStart/body
data.value: The results of your battles are now counted toward the competition, so you can get placed in the rating and earn a reward.

data.name: notification/eventJoin/afterStart/header
data.value: You Have Joined As a Participant

data.name: notification/eventJoin/beforeStart/body
data.value: The results of your battle will be counted once the competition starts, so you can get placed in the rating and earn a reward.

data.name: notification/eventJoin/beforeStart/header
data.value: You Have Joined As a Participant

data.name: notification/eventJoin/conditionsFailed/body
data.value: Unable to join as a participant: the requirements were not met.

data.name: notification/eventJoin/registrationDeadline/body
data.value: Unable to join as a participant: the registration period has ended.

data.name: notification/eventLeave/afterStart/body
data.value: Your statistics in the competitions will be reset after the ratings are updated.

data.name: notification/eventLeave/beforeStart/body
data.value: Your statistics will not be counted toward this competition.

data.name: notification/eventLeave/registrationDeadline/body
data.value: Unable to quit the competition: the allocated time has expired.

data.name: notification/eventStarted/body
data.value: Competition %(eventName)s has started! Players who have taken prize places by the time the competition ends will earn valuable rewards.

data.name: popover/tooltip/class
data.value: Go to the rating for vehicles of the selected type.

data.name: popover/tooltip/level
data.value: Go to the rating for vehicles of the selected tier.

data.name: popover/tooltip/nation
data.value: Go to the rating for vehicles of the selected nation.

data.name: server/list
data.value: To make your battles count toward the competition, transfer to the following server:

data.name: server/noSuitable/body
data.value: Battle results will be counted next at: %(time)s on %(server)s. Competition schedule

data.name: server/noSuitable/header
data.value: Battle results are not counted toward the competition at this time

data.name: status/cantJoin/reason/banned
data.value: You are not allowed to participate in this competition due to your violation of the Game Rules

data.name: status/cantJoin/reason/byBattlesCount
data.value: you have not fought the required number of battles in the Random Battle mode: %(number)s

data.name: status/cantJoin/reason/byWinRateHigh
data.value: your rate of victories in the Random Battle mode exceeds %(number)s%%

data.name: status/cantJoin/reason/byWinRateLow
data.value: you have not reached the following rate of victories in the Random Battle mode: %(number)s%%

data.name: status/cantJoin/reason/endRegistration/tooltip
data.value: You cannot join this competition as a participant.

data.name: status/cantJoin/reason/leftEvent/tooltip
data.value: The results of your battles are no longer counted toward this competition. You will not be placed in the rating or earn a reward. You cannot enter this competition again.

data.name: status/cantJoin/reason/outOfRating
data.value: You did not get placed in the rating

data.name: status/cantJoin/reason/special
data.value: You cannot participate in the competition using this account.

data.name: status/participate/needMoreBattles
data.value: Meet the specified requirements in battles, and your results will be shown here after the ratings are updated.

data.name: status/participate/notParticipated
data.value: You did not participate in the competition

data.name: tooltip/awardIcon
data.value: The reward is granted at the end of the competition and depends on your place in the rating. To see the list of all rewards in this competition, click All Rewards.

data.name: tooltip/top/amount/originalXP
data.value: The amount of experience counted does not include any extra experience from Premium Account or Premium vehicles, Personal Reserves, multipliers for the first victory of the day, or any other specials.

data.name: tooltip/top/amount/xp
data.value: The amount of experience counted does not include any extra experience from Premium vehicles, Personal Reserves, multipliers for the first victory of the day, or any other specials. Extra experience from Premium Account is counted.

data.name: tooltip/top/description/max/damageAssisted
data.value: Damage caused with player's assistance of the player in the last prize place: %(number)s

data.name: tooltip/top/description/max/damageDealt
data.value: Damaged caused by the player in the last prize place: %(number)s

data.name: tooltip/top/description/max/originalXP
data.value: Base experience earned by the player in the last prize place: %(number)s The amount of experience counted does not include any extra experience from Premium Account or Premium vehicles, Personal Reserves, multipliers for the first victory of the day, or any other specials.

data.name: tooltip/top/description/max/xp
data.value: Experience earned by the player in the last prize place: %(number)s The amount of experience counted does not include any extra experience from Premium vehicles, Personal Reserves, multipliers for the first victory of the day, or any other specials. Extra experience from Premium Account is counted.

data.name: tooltip/top/description/sum/damageAssisted
data.value: Total damage caused with player's assistance in the last prize place: %(number)s

data.name: tooltip/top/description/sum/damageDealt
data.value: Total damage caused by the player in the last prize place: %(number)s

data.name: tooltip/top/description/sum/originalXP
data.value: Total base experience earned by the player in the last prize place: %(number)s The amount of experience counted does not include any extra experience from Premium Account or Premium vehicles, Personal Reserves, multipliers for the first victory of the day, or any other specials.

data.name: tooltip/top/description/sum/wins
data.value: Number of victories of the player in the last prize place: %(number)s

data.name: tooltip/top/description/sum/xp
data.value: Total experience earned by the player in the last prize place: %(number)s The amount of experience counted does not include any extra experience from Premium vehicles, Personal Reserves, multipliers for the first victory of the day, or any other specials. Extra experience from Premium Account is counted.
